casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kyle Edward MORTON. No. 536PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2005. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State. Irving Joyner, Durham, for Kyle Edward Morton.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of November 2005 by the Attorney General to Supplement Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of December 2005."
